title: nAma ghOSam
sahitya:
nAma ghOSam niraindirukkum iDangaLai namanum nerunga naDunguvAn shiva


anupallavi

  kAmamAdip-pEigaL shiva nAma kATradittAl parandODum shiva shiva


caraNam    nOi noDigalukkellAm deiveIka auSadam idu onrE (bhayankara)
Azhnda arvuDaiya meyyanbargaL svAnubhUtiyuDan nALum bhajikkum shankara
